# Test: Multiple note_insight calls before task_complete all recorded
gitinit
cp kamaji.yaml kamaji.yaml
exec git add .
exec git commit -m 'init'

env KAMAJI_AGENT_SCRIPT='note_insight "First insight"\nnote_insight "Second insight"\ntask_complete pass "Done"'
exec kamaji start --spawner-cmd=mock-agent
stdout 'Insight: First insight'
stdout 'Insight: Second insight'
stdout 'Task completed: Done'

-- kamaji.yaml --
name: test
base_branch: main
tickets:
  - name: TEST-1
    branch: feat/test-1
    tasks:
      - description: Task 1
